events.name: Sunday Showcase: TechSense
events.description:
TechSense 
Saturday- Sunday, 29-30 October 
10am - 7pm (last entry at 6pm)
Level 4
Free,  Register in the Lobby.

Fashion collides with technology in TechSense, a cutting-edge showcase of connected clothing and accessories designed by students, alumni and faculty members from NTU's School of Art, Design and Media. Watch garments as they respond to the changes in environment. Get a glimpse of wearable tech going haute couture. Meet these innovators shaping up the future of hi-tech fashion.

events.name: IDEA Hacks - IBM Workshop
events.description: (Competition is intended for students, aged 18 years and below) Digital Transformation on the digital Innovation Platform Bluemix. In this digital era, uberization is making many big organizations start learning from new digital startups bringing digital innovation as part of the company’s roadmap. Big data, Cloud, Mobile, IoT, Cognitive and UXUI are buzz words for various organizations to rethink and outthink. Bluemix enables everyone from individual developers to large enterprise teams to rapidly build and deploy new applications, embrace continuous delivery and extend existing IT investments with cloud integration services. With Bluemix, developers have access to a broad portfolio of capabilities -- IBM, open source, and 3rd party services - across DevOps, Big Data, Mobile, IoT, Blockchain, Analytics, Cognitive and Security on Cloud with a click of a button. IBM Bluemix Services that will be discussed: - Watson (Cognitive) - Internet of Things (IoT) - Data Analytics - Mobile Come and learn, share and prepare for IDEA Hacks Challenge. Participants from the workshop will be eligible for mentorship which includes design thinking and quick prototyping. Workshop Registration is on-site. Visit http://ideashub.sg/ for more details & competition registration.

events.name: Singapore Shapeways Meetup - Halloween Edition!
events.description: This time, we will focus on the theme of props and halloween, with a new selection of various 3d printing and other props - with ourselves and the various creators on hand to share the tips and tricks behind the pieces! With any luck, we should have some new Shapeways models to explore and we encourage all who have printed some models with shapeways to bring them down to share and showcase too! One of the materials we will focus on for this time will be the mostly brittle Coloured Sandstone 3d prints. If our test pieces arrive in time, we will be doing some experimental coatings followed by stress and drop tests to see how they fare! Another key feature (thought not Shapeways Printed) will be the massive Torbjorn Turret from Overwatch which we have been working on since the last meetup too! With any luck, we will have a few other prop pieces ready by then too! So feel free to come by, join in and just hang out with us! =)
events.location: Funbie Studios, Liang Court, #B1-07, 177 River Valley Road, Singapore
